root.name: Kolibri
root.description: OverviewKolibri is a side scrolling shooter developed by Novotrade and released for the Sega 32X in 1995, but rather than controlling a ship like in other shooters of this type, you control a humming bird.Kolibri made an appearance in Penny-Arcade on November 29th, 2000 in which Gabe calls the gameÂ "arguably the best hummingbird-based shooter for the 32X!"
